itinerary.day1Heading: Arrival in Goa | Let the Fun Times Begin!
itinerary.day1Overview: Meet and greet our official who will ensure a smooth transfer to your pre-booked hotel in Goa. Complete the check-in formalities and take some rest. Spend the day leisurely exploring the surroundings or nearby beaches with your loved ones. Return to your hotel for an overnight stay in Goa.

itinerary.day2Heading: Water Sports at Calangute Beach | Experience the Adventurous Side of Goa
itinerary.day2Overview: Start your day with a delicious breakfast and gear up for an adventurous day at Calangute Beach. Enjoy thrilling water sports like Jet Ski, Paragliding, Bumper rides, Banana boat rides, and Speedboat rides. After the adrenaline rush, unwind at beachside restaurants or shacks. Witness a beautiful sunset over the Arabian Sea before returning to your hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day3Heading: Bid Farewell to Goa | Cherish the Beach Memories
itinerary.day3Overview: Wake up, have breakfast, pack your bags, and complete the check-out formalities. Depart with joyful memories of Goa to your desired destination, cherishing the moments spent by the beaches.

overView.heading: Beach Bliss in Goa
overView.text: Immerse yourself in the coastal vibes of Goa. Enjoy sun-kissed beaches, water sports, and vibrant beach shacks, offering a perfect blend of relaxation and excitement.

overView.heading: Exploring Goa's Historic Charm
overView.text: Discover Goa's rich history. Visit ancient forts, churches, and Portuguese architecture, reflecting the colonial past and cultural diversity of this coastal paradise.

overView.heading: Adventure and Leisure Activities
overView.text: Embark on thrilling adventures in Goa. Engage in water sports like jet skiing, parasailing, and banana boat rides. Explore spice plantations or indulge in yoga on the beach.

overView.heading: Tranquil Beach Retreats
overView.text: Relax by the tranquil beaches of Goa. Unwind with beachside yoga, sunset walks, and Ayurvedic massages, soaking in the serenity of the Arabian Sea.

overView.heading: Goan Cuisine and Coastal Flavors
overView.text: Delight in Goan cuisine. Savour seafood delicacies, Goan curries, and tropical fruits. Explore vibrant markets for local spices and handicrafts, immersing yourself in Goan culture.

overView.heading: Goa's Cultural Diversity
overView.text: Experience Goa's cultural diversity. From festivals to music scenes, Goa celebrates its blend of Indian and Portuguese influences, creating a unique cultural mosaic.

overView.heading: Plan Your Goa Getaway
overView.text: Craft your perfect Goa itinerary. Whether it's beach activities, cultural exploration, or culinary delights, Goa promises a memorable escape by the Arabian Sea.
